item.title: Captain/First Officer Push-to-Talk (PTT) Switches – Flight Crew Audio Control Panel PTT Switches

numlitem.para: Associated control wheel PTT switch is operative, and
Affected switch is verified inoperative open.

placard.para: Placard affected Panel PTT switch "PTT SW INOP OPEN" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify that the affected ACP PTT switch is inoperative open.
Push the PA transmitter select switch on the associated ACP and ensure the PA MIC light is illuminated.
Without pressing any PTT, speak into the associated microphone and determine if voice transmission can be heard over the PA system. If no voice is heard, the switch is in the open position.
